message: I've got a fantastic opportunity for you! This product is a rare gem, and I'm only offering it to you for $100. It's a steal! I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take the risk of selling it to you at this price. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I'll take it, but I'm only buying it because I have to. I don't have any information about the product's quality yet, so I'm essentially taking a gamble.
